list.description: Foodies are predominantly working professionals in the 25-34 age range with household incomes of $40k+. They often look to apps and social media for restaurant recommendations and reviews, and like sharing their latest finds.

Restaurant Hoppers are predominantly working professionals in the 25-44 age range, with household incomes of $40k+. Like Foodies, they often look to apps and social media for recommendations and reviews.
Commuters are predominantly 25-54 years old. They're working 9-5 and are often cost-conscious individuals. Their average household income is $40k+.

Fast Food Patrons are predominantly workers in the 25-44 age range. Their average household income is $40k or less. They usually have their favourite fast food restaurants on speed dial or use an app to order from their preferred spot.

Coffee Connoisseurs are predominantly working professionals in the 25-44 age range. Their average household income is $40k+. On their way to work, they can often be seen grabbing a cup of joe with a warm pastry.
